bibl.title: Varia Romana: Textiles from a Roman Army Dump.
bibl.note: Qasr Ibrim, excavation seasons of 1978 and 1980: shoulder bag, wool fragment, curtains, textiles with gamma figures.

bibl.title: The Roman Textile Industry and Its Influence. A Birthday Tribute to John Peter Wild

bibl.seg: ADAMS Nettie K. and Elisabeth CROWFOOT, Varia Romana: Textiles from a Roman Army Dump.
Penelope WALTON ROGERS, Lise BENDER JØRGENSEN and Antoinette RAST-EICHER (Edd.), The Roman Textile Industry and Its Influence. A Birthday Tribute to John Peter Wild (Oxford, 2001) pp. 30-37, 5 figg.
Qasr Ibrim, excavation seasons of 1978 and 1980: shoulder bag, wool fragment, curtains, textiles with gamma figures.
